metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3902 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from 9.3 before 15.4.6, all versions starting from 15.5 before 15.5.5, all versions starting from 15.6 before 15.6.1. It was possible for a project maintainer to unmask webhook secret tokens by reviewing the logs after testing webhooks.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
